# Welcome to Bass Pond!

**1430 Parker Street, Springfield, MA**

![Bass Pond in Summer](images/Pond4.jpg)

Bass Pond is a vibrant private community space located at 1430 Parker Street in Springfield, MA. Whether you're here to swim, paddle in one of our kayaks, cast a line, or just relax by the water — there's something for everyone. We host a variety of events throughout the season, including bonfires, craft nights, and other fun community gatherings. With lifeguards on duty and a welcoming atmosphere, Bass Pond is the perfect place to enjoy the outdoors and connect with community.
